resources.string: Welcome to the Creative Workshops App!

This app is designed to help you make the most of your workshops (and meetings). Think of it as a tool-kit full of different techniques and processes that you can use to run amazing events that deliver value.
Explore complementary techniques in WORKSHOP THEMES. Mix and match differences processes in TECHNIQUES.
Thank you for taking the time to explore this app. I hope you are inspired to craft amazing and creative workshops!
Only download attachments when manually requested
5 Whys is an iterative technique that is used to explore cause and effect relationships and uncover root causes of problems.

5 Whys is best used for relatively simple root-cause issues and is a great place to start exploring cause and effect relationships. For more complex root cause issues try using the Root Cause Analaysis technique.
